descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=5][b]Not allowed to be used for any kind of payed mods!
[/b][/size][/color][u][b]

3AM trees[/b][/u]

Version 1.0 contains about 20 dead trees.
This resource will be updated with more trees over time.

These objects can be used as static or trees. Depending on how you import them in the CK.
Only .nif files are included here, you have to place them yourself to see them ingame.
Also there are no LODs, if you can't wait for them you have to create flat tree LODs on your own.

Use them in your mod as you wish, all I'll ask for is to give credit.

[b]Meshes by 3AMt
Textures by 3AMt and Vurt[/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------------


[u][b]Mods using 3AM trees[/b][/u]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35789/]Shadow of Morrowind[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61912]Solstheim Landscape Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66971]Dark Fantasy Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64752]Gray Fox Flora Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.darkcreations.org/forums/forum/119-beyond-skyrim/] Beyond Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://www.darkcreations.org/hoddminir/]Hoddminir[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79492?tab=files]Fantasy Forest Overhaul[/url]

...

(Tell me and I'll also add your mod on the list)
-----------------------------------------------------------------


[b][u]Issues[/u][/b]

- Trees arn't animated. Im working on it, but the process is new to me...


Keep your eyes open for the next packs!
author: 3AMt
